definitions.text: a verbalization that encourages you to attempt something
examples: the ceaseless prodding got on his nerves

definitions.text: tubular extension at the base of the corolla in some flowers
a sharp prod fixed to a rider's heel and used to urge a horse onward
examples: cowboys know not to squat with their spurs on

definitions.text: a railway line connected to a trunk line

examples: The Academy was formed to spur research
